title: Assigning TIF revenues to Southtown Redevelopment Area

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL No. 176	INTRODUCED BY ALDERWOMAN MEGAN E. GREEN Ordinance recommended by the Board of Estimate and Apportionment authorizing the City of St. Louis, Missouri, to assign tif revenues and municipal revenues attributable to the Southtown Redevelopment Area for the purpose of paying the principal of and interest on certain bonds to be issued by the industrial development authority of the City of St. Louis, Missouri; authorizing the city to execute certain documents related thereto; and authorizing and directing the taking of other actions and approval and execution of other documents as necessary or desirable to carry out and comply with the intent hereof.
